Segment.name: LH3
Segment.comment: To specify the hazardous material shipping name and additional descriptive requirements

Field.name: HazardousMaterialShippingName
Field.comment: The proper shipping name of the hazardous commodity as specified by Title 49 Code of Federal Regulations, or the shipping name of the dangerous good as defined in the Canadian Transportation of Dangerous Goods Act and Regulations, or the international regulations as promulgated by the United Nations

Field.name: HazardousMaterialShippingNameQualifier
Field.comment: Qualifier indicating the source (regulatory) of the proper shipping name

Field.name: NOSIndicatorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of regulatory requirements that apply to a description; N.O.S. stands for Not Otherwise Specified

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either LH301 or LH302 is present, then the other is required.
